u-boat.gloss: a submersible warship usually armed with torpedoes

ubermensch.gloss: a person with great powers and abilities

ubiquinone.gloss: any of several quinones found in living cells and that function as coenzymes that transfer electrons from one molecule to another in cell respiration

ubiquitousness.gloss: the state of being everywhere at once (or seeming to be everywhere at once)

ubiquity.gloss: the state of being everywhere at once (or seeming to be everywhere at once)
